Package com.octo.captcha

This is the base package for JCAPTCHAs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Captcha This interface represent a CAPTCHA.
CaptchaEngine CaptchaEngine is the main interface from an application point of view : it uses CapchaFactories in order to return new captchas.
CaptchaFactory Interface for the CAPTCHA factories.
CaptchaService Main interface of the package.
 

Exception Summary
CaptchaException Runtime exception for the captcha implemenentations.
CaptchaServiceException To be thrown when a service user is doing an illegal operation (typically wrang operation flow errors).
 

Package com.octo.captcha Description

This is the base package for JCAPTCHAs.
It defines three main interfaces :

  • Captcha : the container for challenge, built by a CaptchaFactory, which contains the challenge object (a pix or a sound or whatever), the string question, and has the ability to validate a string answer
  • CaptchaFactory : the factory for Captchas :), built by a CaptchaEngine, which have the responsability to build captchas from their constructor passing them builded questions and challenges
  • CaptchaEngine : the factory for the CaptchaFactories, which have the responsability to build CaptchaFactories
  • CaptchaService : the service for applications : Provides an unique tiket and build a captcha using an engine, then exposes methods to use it
